Html:
Hi Mark,
It's very urgent to me.
I have made a product using Naudio but when client testing on it low configuration machine sound splatter(shuttering).Can Naudio support lower configuration machine like:

low power Zotac (Intel Atom D2550, 1.86Ghz CPU, 4GB Ram, Win7).

and (win8, 64bit,1.8 GHZ CPU) and this machine.

it depends how much processing is required on the audio. Just playing a WAV file requires less CPU than decoding MP3 on the fly and processing it through effects. You can usually improve playback stability by increasing your buffer sizes.
